result.markdown:
---
title: "Using renv to create reproducible posts."
author: "Milt"
date: "2024-01-01"
categories: ["Data Science/Programming"]
---




1. Create a new project inside your posts folder.
2. install renv if not already installed using 'install.packages("renv")'.
3. initiate renv using 'renv::init()'.
4. Write code/post.
5. Take a renv snapshot using 'renv::snapshot()'.




### step 4: write some code, install additional packages as needed.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}

DT = data.table(
  ID = c("b","b","b","a","a","c"),
  a = 1:6,
  b = 7:12,
  c = 13:18
)
DT
##    ID a  b  c
## 1:  b 1  7 13
## 2:  b 2  8 14
## 3:  b 3  9 15
## 4:  a 4 10 16
## 5:  a 5 11 17
## 6:  c 6 12 18
```
:::

::: {.cell}

:::
